title: Section

fields.label: Section
fields.name: section
fields.instructions: Create block sections displayed below the content of the page. There are various styles available.

description: A flexible content field of all section types. Used to create pages.

title: Section: Blockquote
description: A blockquote section type. Used in section repeaters and the corresponding widget.

title: Section: Post listing
description: A post listing section type. Used in section repeaters and the corresponding widget.

title: Section: Text
description: A text section type. Used in section repeaters and the corresponding widget.

title: Section: Text with Image
description: A text section type with an image on the side. Used in section repeaters and the corresponding widget.

title: Section Field: Background
description: Background settings attached to section field groups.

title: Section Field: Column
description: Foundation column settings attached to eg. section flexible content fieldgroups.

title: Section Field: Read more
description: A read more button attached to section fieldgroups.

title: Section Field: Title
description: Title settings attached to section field groups.
